definition: the calculated use of violence or the threat of violence against civilians in order to attain goals that are political, religious, ideological in nature
details:
noun
- the calculated use of violence or the threat of violence against civilians in order to attain goals that are political, religious, ideological in nature
= example: the calculated use of violence or the threat of violence against civilians in order to attain goals that are political, religious, ideological in nature
= synonyms: terrorist act
